remarks.format:
## 解説 Handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.ContextDisposing> event, and set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceContextDisposingEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceContextDisposingEventArgs> to **languageKeyword tag is not supported!!!!** . This prevents the disposal of the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext>. For more information, see [Object Context Life\-Cycle Management \(EntityDataSource\)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/ja-jp/67bc2486-112c-47c3-b23f-0297f7ac2160).
## 例 This example maintains the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext> for future reference by handling the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.ContextCreated> event.
``` protected void EntityDataSource2_ContextDisposing(object sender, EntityDataSourceContextDisposingEventArgs e) { e.Cancel = true; }
```
